groups

Class GL2_PrimeField

  • java.lang.Object
    • groups.GL2_PrimeField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Group<GL2_PrimeField>

    public class GL2_PrimeField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Group<GL2_PrimeField>
    A class that models the group of non-singular 2x2 matrices over a short integer prime field, implemented in the framework of the Group interface.

    Elements of the group are represented internally by the uniquely defined integer matrix representative mod q whose entries are non-negative and less than q. The reduced matrix entries are computed at the time of construction. This has the subsequent benefit of rapid equality testing between two GL2_PrimeField elements. In particular, the equals method is overridden in this class to test for equivalence of group elements by checking for equality between corresponding matrix entries.

    Remark: The arithmetic operations mod q in this class are delegated to the class basic_operations.Arithmetic of the Arithmetic module.

    Author:
    pdokos

      Constructor for the identity element of GL2_PrimeField over the field of q elements.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GL2_PrimeField constructIdentity(short q)
      A static helper for producing the identity element of GL2_PrimeField over the field of q elements, where q is prime.
      static GL2_PrimeField constructRandomElement(short q)
      A static helper for producing a random element of GL2_PrimeField over the field of q elements, where q is prime.
      short determinant()
      Computes the determinant of this element mod q, where q is the order of the base field.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object h)
      An override of the equals method so as to return true if: (i) h is an instance of GL2_PrimeField over the same prime field of order q, and (ii) the corresponding entries of the reduced matrix representatives are equal.
      short getA()
      The first entry of the first row of the reduced matrix representative.
      short getB()
      The second entry of the first row of the reduced matrix representative.

      The second entry of the second row of the reduced matrix representative.

      Returns the order of the base field.
      GL2_PrimeField getIdentity()
      Returns the identity element of the group that contains the element making the call.
      GL2_PrimeField getInverse()
      Returns the inverse of the element making the call.
      int hashCode()
      An override of the hashCode method in accordance with that of the equals method.
      boolean isOperationalWith(GL2_PrimeField h)
      Returns true if the base field of h is the same as that of the element making the call.
      GL2_PrimeField leftProductBy(GL2_PrimeField h)
      Returns the left action of h on the element making the call.
      GL2_PrimeField rightProductBy(GL2_PrimeField h)
      Returns the right action of h on the element making the call.
      GL2_PrimeField scalarMultiplyBy(int a)
      Returns the product of this element with the scalar matrix having the value a mod q along the diagonal.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides the toString method so as to return a String representation of the matrix of the element making the call, in the format of a MATLAB matrix.
      java.lang.String toUnpunctuatedString()
      Returns a representation of the element making the call as a String consisting of the four entries of the matrix, followed by the field order, all separated by single spaces.
      GL2_PrimeField transpose()
      Returns the transposed element of GL2_PrimeField.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GL2_PrimeField

        public GL2_PrimeField(int a,
              int b,
              int c,
              int d,
              short q)
        Constructor for a GL2_PrimeField object, invoked by specifying four integer representatives for the matrix entries, and a prime number q for the order of base field. The parameters a and b specify the first row of the matrix, and the parameters c and d specify the second row.

        It is the responsibility of the client to ensure that the parameter q is prime, and that the matrix is non-singular mod q.

        Parameters:
        a - any int
        b - any int
        c - any int
        d - any int
        q - any short integer prime

      • GL2_PrimeField

        public GL2_PrimeField(short q)
        Constructor for the identity element of GL2_PrimeField over the field of q elements.

        It is the responsibility of the client to ensure that the parameter q is prime.

        Parameters:
        q - any short integer prime.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides the toString method so as to return a String representation of the matrix of the element making the call, in the format of a MATLAB matrix.

        Note that the base field order is lost in this representation.

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String representation of the matrix of the element making the call, in the format of a MATLAB matrix.
